question_text: In the MESI cache coherence protocol, what do the four letters M, E, S, and I stand for?
Tomasulo's algorithm, first implemented in the IBM System/360 Model 91, introduced which key technique to enable full out-of-order execution by eliminating false data dependencies?
Write-ahead logging (WAL) is a technique that provides which two specific ACID properties in database systems?
Software transactional memory (STM) was first proposed as a purely software-based mechanism in 1995 by which two researchers?
distractors: Maurice Herlihy and J. Eliot B. Moss

question_text: The LLVM compiler infrastructure project was started in 2000 at which university, under the direction of Vikram Adve and Chris Lattner?
The Spectre hardware vulnerability, disclosed in January 2018, exploits which CPU performance optimization technique to leak sensitive data through cache side channels?
According to the result by Lamport, Shostak, and Pease (1982), what is the minimum number of total nodes required to tolerate f Byzantine (arbitrarily faulty) nodes?
Conflict-free replicated data types (CRDTs), formally defined by Marc Shapiro et al. in 2011, guarantee which specific form of consistency across replicas without requiring coordination?
Which programming language was the first to attempt a comprehensive threading memory model, influencing later efforts in C++11 and C11?
In relational database query optimization, a cost-based optimizer selects an execution plan primarily by estimating what metric for each candidate plan?
correct_answer: The runtime cost in terms of I/O operations, CPU path length, and resource usage
distractors: The total number of SQL keywords parsed in the query
The size of the source code implementing each plan
The number of database tables referenced in the schema
